thread.title: 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization
thread.title_full: 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization

title: 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization
text:
Updated: 8:24 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 | Posted: 8:24 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization Related View Larger Marcio Jose Sanchez / AP This Jan. 2, 2013, file photo shows Los Angeles Clippers' Lamar Odom (7) in action against the Golden State Warriors during an NBA basketball game in Oakland, Calif. Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk LAS VEGAS — 
Former NBA player Lamar Odom, ex-husband of reality TV star Khloe Kardashian, was hospitalized in Nevada on Tuesday night after two women found him unconscious at a legal brothel, The Associated Press reports . 
Here's what we know so far: 
1. Odom reportedly arrived at Love Ranch on Saturday. Dennis Hof, the brothel's owner, told the AP that staffers brought Odom there because he "wanted to get away, have a good time and relax." On Tuesday, two women checked on him in his room, where he was unconscious. 
"We called 911, and the 911 told my staff what to do: turn him over on his left side," Hof told NBC News . "There was this terrible foaming stuff coming out of him." 
Odom was taken to Desert View Hospital in Pahrump, then transported to Las Vegas' Sunrise Hospital. 
>> RELATED: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel​ 
2. Reports vary on his condition. The AP said "there was no immediate word" on his status. 
3. Odom did not appear to be taking any illegal drugs at the brothel, Hof said. But Odom reportedly was seen drinking Cognac and taking "herbal Viagra." 
>> Read more trending stories 
4. Several celebrities and athletes are offering well-wishes. "On my knees praying ... please God let him pull thru," Miami Heat star Dwyane Wade posted . I can't help but to be up right now... THINKING about my ex teammate/ friend LO.. On my knees praying...please God let him pull thru..
